name: Project SkillCheck v1.1
description:
After leaving your childhood home to become a pirate you have returned after 7 long years at sea... But, upon arrival you see that your home village of Horse shoe is burning to the ground and being looted by FluxxGoblins &  the lost souls know as The Demonic Knights.... But why? is it for ... Money?  land?  fear? or does it have something to do with the mysterious voices being heard at the shrine of the elder gods?  Either way you must find your family sword "The Telsa" , slay the DemonMoose TYRELL and save your town before its to late.

Controls:

  •      Inventory- I/ Select ( You have 2 swords to start with 3 total)
  • Strong ATK- L-Click /RB
  • Weak ATK- 1/RT
  • Block-R-Click /LB
  • Sprint-SHIFT /R3
  • Crouch-C /Y
  • Use Food-U/LT ( there are 3 potions total)
  • Move-WASD/JOYSTICKS
  • Use Equiptments to add your weapons and food
  • Use Items to check inventory
